speaker: Fool
text_entry: ACT II

speaker: Fool
text_entry: SCENE I. GLOUCESTER's castle.

speaker: Fool
text_entry: Enter EDMUND, and CURAN meets him

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Save thee, Curan.

speaker: CURAN
text_entry: And you, sir. I have been with your father, and

speaker: CURAN
text_entry: given him notice that the Duke of Cornwall and Regan

speaker: CURAN
text_entry: his duchess will be here with him this night.

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: How comes that?

speaker: CURAN
text_entry: Nay, I know not. You have heard of the news abroad;

speaker: CURAN
text_entry: I mean the whispered ones, for they are yet but

speaker: CURAN
text_entry: ear-kissing arguments?

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Not I pray you, what are they?

speaker: CURAN
text_entry: Have you heard of no likely wars toward, 'twixt the

speaker: CURAN
text_entry: Dukes of Cornwall and Albany?

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Not a word.

speaker: CURAN
text_entry: You may do, then, in time. Fare you well, sir.

speaker: CURAN
text_entry: Exit

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: The duke be here to-night? The better! best!

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: This weaves itself perforce into my business.

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: My father hath set guard to take my brother;

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: And I have one thing, of a queasy question,

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Which I must act: briefness and fortune, work!

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Brother, a word; descend: brother, I say!

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Enter EDGAR

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: My father watches: O sir, fly this place;

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Intelligence is given where you are hid;

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: You have now the good advantage of the night:

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Have you not spoken 'gainst the Duke of Cornwall?

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: He's coming hither: now, i' the night, i' the haste,

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: And Regan with him: have you nothing said

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Upon his party 'gainst the Duke of Albany?

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Advise yourself.

speaker: EDGAR
text_entry: I am sure on't, not a word.

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: I hear my father coming: pardon me:

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: In cunning I must draw my sword upon you

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Draw; seem to defend yourself; now quit you well.

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Yield: come before my father. Light, ho, here!

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Fly, brother. Torches, torches! So, farewell.

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Exit EDGAR

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Some blood drawn on me would beget opinion.

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Wounds his arm

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Of my more fierce endeavour: I have seen drunkards

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Do more than this in sport. Father, father!

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Stop, stop! No help?

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Enter GLOUCESTER, and Servants with torches

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: Now, Edmund, where's the villain?

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Here stood he in the dark, his sharp sword out,

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Mumbling of wicked charms, conjuring the moon

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: To stand auspicious mistress,--

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: But where is he?

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Look, sir, I bleed.

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: Where is the villain, Edmund?

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Fled this way, sir. When by no means he could--

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: Pursue him, ho! Go after.

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: Exeunt some Servants

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: By no means what?

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Persuade me to the murder of your lordship;

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: But that I told him, the revenging gods

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: 'Gainst parricides did all their thunders bend;

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Spoke, with how manifold and strong a bond

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: The child was bound to the father; sir, in fine,

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Seeing how loathly opposite I stood

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: To his unnatural purpose, in fell motion,

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: With his prepared sword, he charges home

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: My unprovided body, lanced mine arm:

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: But when he saw my best alarum'd spirits,

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Bold in the quarrel's right, roused to the encounter,

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Or whether gasted by the noise I made,

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Full suddenly he fled.

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: Let him fly far:

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: Not in this land shall he remain uncaught;

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: And found--dispatch. The noble duke my master,

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: My worthy arch and patron, comes to-night:

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: By his authority I will proclaim it,

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: That he which finds him shall deserve our thanks,

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: Bringing the murderous coward to the stake;

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: He that conceals him, death.

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: When I dissuaded him from his intent,

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: And found him pight to do it, with curst speech

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: I threaten'd to discover him: he replied,

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: 'Thou unpossessing bastard! dost thou think,

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: If I would stand against thee, would the reposal

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Of any trust, virtue, or worth in thee

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Make thy words faith'd? No: what I should deny,--

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: As this I would: ay, though thou didst produce

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: My very character,--I'ld turn it all

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: To thy suggestion, plot, and damned practise:

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: And thou must make a dullard of the world,

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: If they not thought the profits of my death

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Were very pregnant and potential spurs

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: To make thee seek it.'

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: Strong and fasten'd villain

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: Would he deny his letter? I never got him.

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: Tucket within

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: Hark, the duke's trumpets! I know not why he comes.

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: All ports I'll bar; the villain shall not 'scape;

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: The duke must grant me that: besides, his picture

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: I will send far and near, that all the kingdom

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: May have the due note of him; and of my land,

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: Loyal and natural boy, I'll work the means

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: To make thee capable.

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: Enter CORNWALL, REGAN, and Attendants

speaker: CORNWALL
text_entry: How now, my noble friend! since I came hither,

speaker: CORNWALL
text_entry: Which I can call but now, I have heard strange news.

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: If it be true, all vengeance comes too short

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: Which can pursue the offender. How dost, my lord?

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: O, madam, my old heart is crack'd, it's crack'd!

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: What, did my father's godson seek your life?

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: He whom my father named? your Edgar?

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: O, lady, lady, shame would have it hid!

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: Was he not companion with the riotous knights

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: That tend upon my father?

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: I know not, madam: 'tis too bad, too bad.

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Yes, madam, he was of that consort.

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: No marvel, then, though he were ill affected:

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: 'Tis they have put him on the old man's death,

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: To have the expense and waste of his revenues.

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: I have this present evening from my sister

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: Been well inform'd of them; and with such cautions,

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: That if they come to sojourn at my house,

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: I'll not be there.

speaker: CORNWALL
text_entry: Nor I, assure thee, Regan.

speaker: CORNWALL
text_entry: Edmund, I hear that you have shown your father

speaker: CORNWALL
text_entry: A child-like office.

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: 'Twas my duty, sir.

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: He did bewray his practise; and received

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: This hurt you see, striving to apprehend him.

speaker: CORNWALL
text_entry: Is he pursued?

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: Ay, my good lord.

speaker: CORNWALL
text_entry: If he be taken, he shall never more

speaker: CORNWALL
text_entry: Be fear'd of doing harm: make your own purpose,

speaker: CORNWALL
text_entry: How in my strength you please. For you, Edmund,

speaker: CORNWALL
text_entry: Whose virtue and obedience doth this instant

speaker: CORNWALL
text_entry: So much commend itself, you shall be ours:

speaker: CORNWALL
text_entry: Natures of such deep trust we shall much need;

speaker: CORNWALL
text_entry: You we first seize on.

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: I shall serve you, sir,

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Truly, however else.

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: For him I thank your grace.

speaker: CORNWALL
text_entry: You know not why we came to visit you,--

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: Thus out of season, threading dark-eyed night:

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: Occasions, noble Gloucester, of some poise,

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: Wherein we must have use of your advice:

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: Our father he hath writ, so hath our sister,

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: Of differences, which I least thought it fit

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: To answer from our home; the several messengers

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: From hence attend dispatch. Our good old friend,

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: Lay comforts to your bosom; and bestow

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: Your needful counsel to our business,

speaker: REGAN
text_entry: Which craves the instant use.

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: I serve you, madam:

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: Your graces are right welcome.

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: Exeunt
